about.hero.title: About Our Search Engine
about.hero.subtitle: Fast, personalized, and reliable search results across Web, YouTube, and News
about.features.title: Features
about.features.title1: Get results from Web, Videos, and News in one place.
about.features.title2: Quick access to your last searches for efficiency.
about.features.title3: Future feature: tailored searches for logged-in users.
about.features.title4: A simple, responsive, and easy-to-use interface.
about.founder.title: About Founder
about.founder.para1:
Our founder Mr. Love kumar is a visionary who believes in simplicity,
peed, and innovation With a deep understanding of technology and a
passion for creating platforms, they envisioned a tool that makes searching
smarter, faster, and more personalized. Guided by creativity and dedication,
the founder’s mission has always been to bridge the gap between complex
information and easy access for everyone.
about.founder.para2:
Built on this vision, our search engine combines web, video,
and news results in one unified platform. It is designed to
save users time and provide the most relevant results efficiently.
With features like AI-powered insights, personalized suggestions,
and a clean, intuitive interface, the platform aims to transform
the way people explore, learn, and discover information online.
about.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
about.faq.question1: How is this search engine different from Google or Bing?
about.faq.answer1: Our search engine is inspired by popular platforms but goes further. It brings web, video, and news results together in one place, with an added AI mode for deeper insights. Unlike traditional search engines, it focuses on simplicity, personalization, and keeping all your search needs on a single page.
about.faq.question2: What unique features make ur search engine stand out?
about.faq.answer2: Our platform goes beyond simple text search. You can use voice-to-text with a speaking mic for hands-free searching, explore results in multiple languages, and even switch to AI Mode with an interactive chat assistant that explains, summarizes, or dives deeper into topics just like a personal guide.
about.faq.question3: Will my past searches be saved?
about.faq.answer3: Recent searches are stored locally on your device to help you quickly revisit queries. Nothing is uploaded to our servers without your consent.
about.faq.question4: Is this search engine faster than using multiple platforms?
about.faq.answer4: Yes! Because results are unified, you spend less time navigating different apps or websites, which makes the experience feel faster and smoother.
about.faq.answer5: In the future, logged-in users will be able to receive personalized results tailored to their preferences and history.
about.faq.question6: Does it work on mobile devices?
about.faq.answer6: Absolutely. The platform is fully responsive and optimized for smartphones, tablets, and desktops.
about.faq.answer7: We prioritize privacy by minimizing tracking and avoiding unnecessary data collection. Your searches are private to you.
about.faq.answer8: In the future, we’re planning features like collaborative search sessions, AI-generated knowledge panels, context-aware results, and smarter cross-platform syncing. Our goal is to move search from being just a tool into a truly personalized, interactive experience.
